articles.author: Nick Lichtenberg
articles.title: Palantir CEO warns of America’s AI ‘danger zone’ as he plans to bring ‘superpowers’ to blue-collar workers - Fortune
articles.description: CEO Alex Karp said Palantir is “an America story,” and he doesn’t care whether his workers went to Harvard or Princeton or Yale: “Once you come to Palantir, you’re a Palantirian.”
articles.content: Palantir Technologies just achieved a milestone that would have seemed outlandish even to its boldest promoters a year ago: a first-ever billion-dollar quarter, propelled by a runaway boom in artific… [+4849 chars]
